caption.p: Prey diversity observed in the diet of badger and fox using eDNA metabarcoding. ( A) proportion of different sequences identified with each of the three markers in badger and fox samples, ( B) number of different taxa per sample, ( C) proportion of samples that contained a prey identified with a single, two, or all three universal markers targeting plant, invertebrate and vertebrate DNA in badger and fox faecal samples.
